p: To evaluate NP genetic variations by mini-genome assay, point mutations were introduced into the NP gene of A/Taiwan/3446/02 strain by site-directed mutagenesis PCR with specific primer pairs. All of the mutations analyzed in Fig.Â 3 were generated from the A/Taiwan/3446/02 NP backbone. Mutations in Fig. 3ab were arranged from KSG because of the dominant circulating sequence being KSG. The template plasmids were removed by DpnI. E. coli containing NP mutation plasmids were amplified in LB broth and plasmids were extracted by Qiagen plasmid midi kit for further analysis.
